Primary Contact: Kasia Rynkowski, Manager, Diversified Rehabilitation Group
Service Details: Offers clinical counselling, psycological assessments & treatments, occupational therapy, vocational rehabilitation, medical legal assessments, disability management, employee & family wellness programs, and traumatic stress recovery programs * 11-week PTSD recovery program open to members of the general public, first responders, and veterans
Eligibility: To be eligible for our TSRP, you must be 19 years old or older. Counselling services are available for children and youth.
How to Apply: Individuals can self-refer or have their employer, insurance company, or teratment provider send a referral on their behalf.
